DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical performance of the Zenith Alpha™ Abdominal Endovascular Graft for the treatment of abdominal aortic or aorto-iliac aneurysm.
DOC.criteria: A patient is considered eligible for inclusion in the study if the patient has an infrarenal abdominal aortic or aortoiliac aneurysm and is intended to be treated with the Zenith Alpha™ Abdominal Endovascular Graft Life expectancy less than (<) 2 years Inability or refusal to give informed consent by the patient or legally authorized representative Unwilling or unable to comply with the study followup
